mapper.select: select s.* FROM s_nav_bar s LEFT JOIN r_nav_user r on r.nav_id = s.id left join `user` u ON r.user_id = u.id left join s_nav_category sc on sc.id = r.category_id WHERE u.id=#{userId} and sc.id=#{categoryId} and s.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY s.ord;

select s.* FROM s_nav_bar s LEFT JOIN r_nav_user r on r.nav_id = s.id left join `user` u ON r.user_id = u.id left join s_nav_category sc on sc.id = r.category_id WHERE s.parent_nav_id is NULL and s.is_deleted=0 and u.id=#{userId} and sc.id=#{categoryId} ORDER BY s.ord;

select s.* FROM s_nav_bar s LEFT JOIN r_nav_user r on r.nav_id = s.id left join `user` u ON r.user_id = u.id left join s_nav_category sc on sc.id = r.category_id where s.parent_nav_id = #{parentId} and s.is_deleted=0 AND u.id=#{userId} and sc.id=#{categoryId} ORDER BY s.ord
SELECT DISTINCT sc.* FROM s_nav_category sc LEFT JOIN r_nav_user r on r.category_id = sc.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId};
